# reply(content:message:)

**Instance Method**

Sends a reply to the specific endpoint that originates a group message you receive.

## Declaration

```swift
func reply(content: Data?, message: NWConnectionGroup.Message = .default)
```

## Replying to Received Messages

- **extractConnection()**: Converts a message you receive from an endpoint into a connection object that you use for long-term communication with that endpoint.

items.description: Converts a message you receive from an endpoint into a connection object that you use for long-term communication with that endpoint.
items.name: extractConnection()
